shortForecast: Chance Light Rain then Light Snow
name: Today
detailedForecast: A chance of rain between 11am and 3pm, then snow between 3pm and 4pm, then snow and sleet between 4pm and 5pm, then sleet and freezing rain. Cloudy. High near 39, with temperatures falling to around 32 in the afternoon. East wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.
